cases.title: Contract rate 5% not applied after addendum
cases.summary: Contract addendum effective Sep 9 specified 5.0% rate, but both registry and reconciliation continued charging 4.8% for 37 days (Sep 9 – Oct 16). Total underpayment: 4,226.88 EUR.

cases.title: Registry-Reconciliation commission gap
cases.summary: Registry continued charging 4.8% effective rate while reconciliation switched to 4.2% from Oct 16. The gap persisted through November 30. Total overpayment in registry vs reconciliation: 24,966.10 EUR.

cases.title: EUR Acquiring contract not provided (MK 1127)
cases.summary: EUR card acquiring (MK 1127) processed 7.8M EUR with 386,899 EUR total commission. Acquiring contract not provided. Only Smartflow ToB documents ghost rates. The 1.75% base commission (323,083 EUR) has no contract backing.

cases.title: Rate 4.2% applied early — TRY Card
cases.summary: TRY Card Acquiring: reconciliation applied 4.2% on Oct 16, one day before contract addendum (Oct 17). Contract rate was 5.0%. Underpayment: 196.44 EUR.

cases.title: Rate 4.2% applied early — USD Card
cases.summary: USD Card Acquiring: reconciliation applied 4.2% on Oct 16, one day before contract addendum (Oct 17). Contract rate was 5.0%. Underpayment: 51.53 EUR.

cases.title: Rate 4.2% applied early — NOK Card
